columns.Performance_ID: A unique identifier for each performance event.
columns.Date: The date on which the performance took place.
columns.Host: The team or organization that hosted the performance.
columns.Location: The venue where the performance was held.
columns.Attendance: The number of attendees present at the performance.

performance.table_description: The performance table records details of various performance events, including their unique identifiers, dates, hosts, locations, and attendance figures.

columns.Member_ID: Identifies a member who attends a performance.
columns.Performance_ID: Identifies the specific performance attended by a member.
columns.Num_of_Pieces: Represents the number of pieces performed by the member during the attendance at the performance.

member_attendance.table_description: The member_attendance table captures the attendance records of members at performances, detailing which member attended which performance and the number of pieces they performed.

columns.Member_ID: A unique identifier assigned to each member in the table.
columns.Name: The full name of the member.
columns.Nationality: The country of citizenship or origin of the member.
columns.Role: The specific instrumental role or position held by the member within the group.

member.table_description: The member table stores information about the members of a group, detailing their unique identifiers, names, national origins, and roles in the ensemble.
